mapper.sql: a.area AS "area", a.cardtype AS "cardtype", a.sstored AS "sstored", a.term AS "term", a.equity AS "equity", a.creat_by AS "creatBy", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO yp_cardtype( area, cardtype, sstored, term, equity, creat_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{area}, #{cardtype}, #{sstored}, #{term}, #{equity}, #{creatBy}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE yp_cardtype SET area = #{area}, cardtype = #{cardtype}, sstored = #{sstored}, term = #{term}, equity = #{equity}, creat_by = #{creatBy}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
